synopsis.text:
Battle-weary after their triumph over Dr. Hell, Kouji and his brave comrades find themselves facing an unexpected resurgence of evil. A mysterious prophet heralds the return of the menacing Mikene Empire, led by the ruthless Ankoku Daishogun. As terrifying, never-before-seen mechanical beasts wreak havoc across the globe, the once-invincible Mazinger Z struggles against this formidable new enemy.

With the world teetering on the brink of destruction, our heroes must rise to the challenge, even as they find themselves outnumbered and outgunned. News reports flood in from every corner of the Earth, detailing the relentless onslaught of these monstrous machines. Kouji, Boss, Diana A, and the rest of the team must now marshal their courage and resources to stand against the General of Darkness and his seemingly unstoppable army.

In this desperate hour, the stage is set for the introduction of a new warrior, one who could tip the balance in favor of humanity. As the link between the Mazinger Z and Great Mazinger series, this film serves as a thrilling prelude to the continuing saga of heroism and sacrifice in the face of overwhelming odds. Will Kouji and his friends once again emerge victorious, or will the world succumb to the iron grip of the Mikene Empire? The fate of all mankind hangs in the balance.
